title: Object Communication Part 1
description: This video covers how to determine if two circles are overlapping (intersecting) in a p5.js sketch. The functionality is demonstrated with an object-oriented approach.

timestamps.title: Assigning a Default Value to a Parameter
Returning the Result of a Boolean
